service.service_section_description: We have access to over 50 services that can help you solve any problem.
service.service_section_right_title: EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN ONE PLACE
service.service_section_right_description: Car services are essential for keeping your vehicle in good condition and running smoothly. There are a variety of services available, from basic oil changes to more complex repairs.

product.product_left_description: You have access to over 100 stores Quickly and conveniently buy original spare parts or high-quality analogues from reliable suppliers.
product.product_right_description: Wherever you are, we can help you.

map.product_left_description: Always plan your trip in advance. It will help you avoid surprises and save time.
